page.title: 07REDBOURN BY_PASS CONT
page.content: An exhibition and public meeting was held in{Redbourn Village Hall}in{June {1979}.People were able to see the alternative ideas and raise any questions. The plan which was finally chosen has the{By_Pass}starting on the{Hemel {Hempstead Road}just to the East of the {M1}flyover.It runs North_Eastwards along the route of a disused railway. There is a roundabout junction with the{A5}just South of the village and the By_Pass continues N.E.to a second roundabout at{Harpenden Lane}.The By_pass then curves North_West to link up with the{A5}again just North of the village. Since the By Pass has been opened a tremendous decrease in the amount of traffic using the High Street and the two junction of the (B487).{
